data.scheme_name: Bihar Export Promotion Policy 2024 - Performance based Subsidy - General - Female - Existing
data.benefits: The scheme offers a performance-based subsidy of 1% on the additional free on-board value, up to Rs. 11.50 lakhs per annum for 7 years, for exporters who achieve 50% more in export value compared to the previous financial year.
data.eligibility:
1. Applicable to units engaged in manufacturing or processing activities in Bihar with a registered office in the state. 
  2. Must hold an IEC (Importer Exporter Code) number.
data.conditions:
1. Only for exports of manufactured goods contributing to value addition. 
  2. State of origin must be Bihar in the shipping bill under the Indian Customs EDI system.
data.beneficiaries:
1. Applicable to units engaged in manufacturing or processing activities in Bihar with a registered office in the state. 
  2. Must hold an IEC (Importer Exporter Code) number.
data.prerequisites:
1. Only for exports of manufactured goods contributing to value addition. 
  2. State of origin must be Bihar in the shipping bill under the Indian Customs EDI system.
data.context: The Bihar Export Promotion Policy 2024 is designed to enhance the state’s export capabilities by providing support and incentives to businesses. It aims to identify new markets, improve product standards, and create a favorable trade environment.
data.objective:
1. To boost the state’s export sector by creating a supportive environment for businesses.
  2. This includes providing necessary incentives and support to exporters, identifying new markets, and improving product standards.
  3. The policy aims to harness Bihar’s untapped potential, attract both domestic and international investments, and significantly increase export volumes.
data.description: The scheme offers a performance-based subsidy of 1% on the additional free on-board value, up to Rs. 11.50 lakhs per annum for 7 years, for exporters who achieve 50% more in export value compared to the previous financial year.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through this link:https://swc2.bihar.gov.in/investor/register
data.funding_mechanism:
1. Submit applications via the Single Window Clearance Portal.
  2. Department verifies and approves applications.
  3. Funds are disbursed directly to the beneficiary's bank account.
  4. Compliance is monitored by the department.
data.additional_info:
1. Under this policy, the following units will not be eligible for any support: 
    • Units manufacturing narcotic drugs
    • Units manufacturing alcoholic beverages
    • Tobacco-based industries
    • Units manufacturing asbestos
  2. Units can combine benefits from both Central and Bihar government schemes.
data.checklist_info_a:
Import export certificate
Copy of Aadhaar
Copy of PAN card
Copy of License
Copy of GST Registration and Sale tax Number
Copy of Company Registration
Copy of Income Tax Return for last Three Years
data.checklist_info_d:
Address : Department of Industries,
Email : sipb.care@bihar.gov.in
Phone : 18003456214,
data.beneficiary: Manufacturing Industries - All Entities - Bihar - MSMEs and Non MSMEs
